title: Mouse lag
body: My mouse lags so strangely. It actually moves like if I was playing minecraft. When I move it, it lags then suddenly move to some other place

replies.body: Are you on a Mac or PC?  I'm not sure what you mean by moving like Minecraft, but I'm assuming it's kind of sluggish.  Keep in mind that your mouse settings in-game may not match your settings out side of it.  You'll want to go in-game, access your options via the Esc key, and adjust your mouse sensitivity.  Let me know if this helps!
